content.detailedDescription: Wife & i saw vertical cigar black/purple/grey the eastern clouds had pinks and lavender colors, far off above tree line, seemed stationary, then after a few minutes slowly ascended, thru a wispy cloud but continued straight up like a rocket (we've seen many a launch & this was very different & no fire)& flight was smooth not like a saturn rocket power. it passed thru another wisp cloud then a cloud like exhaust stayed w/it, like a jet or chem trail, it stayed with the vertical cigar & it speeded up into a thick cloud bank and we saw it no more. both of us independently noticed the trail and the speed change.
content.summary: Vertical cigar above tree top, then went straight up slowly

content.detailedDescription:
My 7 yrs old son spotted vertical lights in the sky while driving out of the parking lot of walmart at 8659 columbus pike
lewis center, oh 43035. they were visible far off in the sky. definitely not a man made aircraft. earlier thought crane lights, but then realized it was way too high and also somewhere over the forest area in the middle of nowhere.It was not a hot air balloon nor a kite. could not spot more features since it was cloudy and rainy.
content.summary: Vertical lights were visible far off in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was at saint mary's soup kitchen amoung about 100 others, it was about fourpm. i was looking about me when i observed a silvery disk with a dome on top come directly out of the clouds. it stopped and hovered for 3 to 5  seconds. i just know that it was aware that i was observering and, then it sharply turned right and banked into the clouds where i could no longer see it. no one said anything and, i also remained silent about the occurrence. i felt that it was appearing to me personally and to this day, still do.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was standing in the midst of about 100 people, when the object appeared, banked iinto clouds sharply to the right.

content.detailedDescription: Driving down a long road i stopped to see the pretty confetti of starlike flashes surrounding and engulfing my path, i got my video to try to capture the sparkles.  it looked like a ufo resting on the ground, around 30 feet across, with what looked like two small glowing entities standing on the centre rim of the craft with big black eyes and large heads.   above to the side of that area was a sphere suspended in mid air looked like a big silvery mirror sphere approximately 20 to 30 feet wide.  the entities legs seem to be moving just like restless legs and the back one looked as if it was hiding behind the front one both peering in my direction.   no noise was heard.  i drove off as fast as, feeling uneasy. i wish mufon to look at the video and pictures first before publicly showing.  i still am shocked by it all. all in all 2 craft and 2 entities.
content.summary: Landed ufo with glowing entities accompanied by mirrored sphere

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from work, it had been storming. seen an orange line against dark sky. it seemed to hover then slowly rotate, that's when i seen it had a round outline. only half the circle had a glowing edge. it stayed on it's side and was hard to see through trees and clouds. i drove to argillite fire dept parking lot. watched it slowly rotate and fade into a storm cloud. the moon was behind me and behind clouds but still illuminated sky enough to see clouds. it was silent but definitely a solid object with purposeful movements. i took pics and lights, and shape can be made out.A similar object was photographed in south point ohio a few weeks ago during a storm. just 45 minutes away.
content.summary: Seen a orange line connecting two orange lights against a dark cloud ( it had been storming ). as it hovered it turned and became round. faded into a storm cloud

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Respected sir/madam,

my self sandip roy, i am from kolkata. i want to send and share my experience with you it might help you in some way i think. so i just about to tell you in brief what happens just 3 days back.

the incident :
i am working in kolkata, just few days ago i came to know that i have to visit one of our customer in mp(maddhya pradesh) our customer is hindalco so without any further preparation i board a train from kolkata to singrauli (shaktipunj express) from howrah. i couldn't sleep well in train so at night i was awake almost all the time. the incident took place at around 1:15am when i was looking through the window i saw a plane is flying parallel to our train so i overlooked it but suddenly it catch my attention when i saw strange lights coming from it green, yellow, red, orange, blue all the colors are there it was just amazing to watch, so i watch it for a while the i realize amazing and horrible things. the unusual craft is moving very fast like jumping from one place to another place in seconds first it was small jumps then over time it jumps like one end of the sky to another end and then come back to the same place again then again right above our train then right side of the train again in left side. i came out to the door of the train to watch it clearly i saw it clearly, generally a plane took at least 15-20 seconds or more to cross the area which it crosses in a blink of an eye,and the lights were really unusual. it happens after we cross the station chetar somewhere in jharkhand i think and stopped where few days ago a train accident happened lots of flud lights are there the train also slowed down there. i you want i can give you all the details. kindly reply me. 

thanks and regards
sandip roy 
+918013169556
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Description is below

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking through the neighborhood.
2. i'm always watching the skies, got lucky for once. =d
3. several ufo's, was not anything identifiable.
4. 4-5 silver/metallic spherical objects heading due west in apparent formation. they could possibly have been disc shaped or circular. even though it was broad daylight, they were pretty far away. they were definitely reflecting sunlight, maybe even more so than a metallic structured craft. think how a mirror can reflect light from very far away.I remember thinking that it's weird to see "lights" in the sky in the middle of the day. several miles away from where i was standing, making them difficult to see clearly. four of them were in a diamond formation with one or possibly two off to the right side. they seemed to be moving in and out of this formation continually. one would move right up next to another, then back to it's original spot in the formation. eventually the formation was broken and they appeared to be moving about randomly after that. they never stopped heading west, all the maneuvers were performed while moving away. as they moved away, they became more difficult to see, until eventually i lost track of them all. my neighbor claimed they might be balloons, but they don't stay in formation or maneuver back and forth, or look like mirrors reflecting sunlight.
5. i went from surprised to happy to motivated to annoyed and to vindicated and back again. as i watched this happen, i did try to take a video and pictures with my smart phone. though the camera on this particular phone isn't very high quality, so i was not able to produce any results. i also tried to get a neighbor to look but he claimed his eyesight was so bad that he wouldn't be able to see them. (who would willingly skip out on a chance to see a ufo??? oddly, he's retired air force, telling maybe?) i didn't try to verify if the video or pictures came out as this was happening because i didn't want to miss anything.
6. eventually they moved too far away for me to see them.
content.summary: Several silver/metallic objects flying and interacting with each other.

content.detailedDescription: 5 of us were out riding in car. summer, radio on, drinking. we went around a curve and saw this hugh light. i don't know why, it was like a light i'd never seen before. as i looked at it a voice in my head was saying "this isn't real, u don't  really see it. i didn't say a word. nor did anyone else. everyone was quite. after maybe 1/2 to 1 mile on down the road one of the girls in back says "what was that". that's when everybody all at once proclaimed, u saw it to. we turned around and went back. it was  total dark. 2 of us have died, 1 moved and hasn't been seen, one lives close. all i know is whenever we ran into each other the question always came up. what did we see that night. i didn't know then and i don't know now. it haunts me,i know i saw it but i cain't describe it. it was like the light was coming down but everything in it was somehow moving up. i would like to be hypnotised to find out what we saw. this happen on a saturday night. the next week our small town paper ran a paragraph saying a ufo was reported on sunday 10 miles from where we were.
content.summary: Hugh light in the early am

content.detailedDescription: July 1st, 2015, went outside between 8:20 thru 8:30 pm, first to have a cigarette, i noticed two bright stationary lights where the airplanes usually come in for approach , the one white light was significantly brighter than the 2nd, both were close together, appearing un-moving, no noise, i had the smoke, figured, they were helicopters, after about 5 minutes they didn't leave, i kept coming back out, they were not gone until sometime after 8:30, at 8:30 they were still there, around 9 they were gone. i did get one video, and two photo's, upon reviewing the video i notice a third light in the bottom of the screen, bottom right, near houses ,but it may just be the vantage point, i cannot tell if it is another one of the lights, a plane approach, or what, but it seems to flash a few times, weird. my best estimate on location would be between the western border of south mountain preserve in phoenix near ahwatukee foothills, and lavern, 52nd avenue and estrella, which is over the gila indian reservation, it did not appear to be real far, it did not seem to be north of south mountain, if at all, it seemed to be near the gila indian reservation, almost as if it was over the south mountain but just south of it. i was filming it from my back yard, looking westward, which my house is 3002 e muirwood, south mountain is just north of me.
content.summary: Two hovering lights, one apparently larger than the other, star like in appearance, one was bright white very bright , 2nd was more yellow, appeared smaller, hovering what seemed adjacent to the west to southwest flight approach path of sky harbor

content.detailedDescription:
Ok. so i believe i know what the crop circle that appeared near stone hedge is depicting!! first you must view our solar system from above (to gain this understanding and "perspective").. (an "overhead" perspective)..Enter date of 6/30/2015 start (your simulation) at around 10pm (i observed and had this revelation as the conjunction was occurring) run it forward through midnight...I began to wonder if i could find more occurring... i did....As i repositioned the perspective to zoom out and an overhead view of our system i made what appears to be shocking discoveries.. multiple conjunctions
from earth:
1.Jupiter-venus
2.Mars-mercury (possibly @ earlier hour)
from moon:
1.Jupiter-venus
2.Uranus-earth
3.Mars-mercury (possibly @ earlier hour)
from ceres:
1.Jupiter-venus-earth
2.Mars-mercury
from mars:
1.Pluto-ceres
2.Mercury-pluto
from uranus:
1.Saturn-earth
from pluto:
1.Mars-mercury
from jupiter:
1.Uranus-mars
2.Earth-venus

now if that all wasnt enough. still zoomed out above the solar system i suddenly observed what appears to be the planets making a sort of arrow!!!!!!
if you make jupiter the point of the arrow and draw a line from it to uranus, neptune, earth...You will observe an arrow or pointer..Of sorts....So at that point i was stunned....I thought some more and asked myself could this "arrow" really be pointing to something?  i decided to change the perspective lowering it to a "level" position observing jupiter from behind and to the rt of earth...As i looked it appeared that there was a star off in the distance in front of jupiter..There was..Iz..But wait...So i said to myself ok.. lemme change to a constillational view.............When i did i was dumbfounded.... "the star" i thought i was observing was ... is regulus.....

so... i ask my best friend what kind of star is regulus and of course he informs me its not... its four stars........Now..... about 2 or 3 hrs later he comes running to tell me.. a new crop circle was just discovered ... near stone hedge.........Smh..Smh..Smh.....So i tell him to show me a pic of it...And well when he did, i immediately knew what it is...Depicting....

"the cross" = tip of a spear = arrow = pointer
"4 crescents = the 4 stars of regulus (the 2 that are opposite eachother of the same size would be regulus bc .. while the larger crescent would represent regulus a ....Etc......
the tip of the pointer is pointing to the regulus star system...That crop circle is truly a galactic marker.
lastly i believe the kind of "blur streak" that appears in the one corner of the crop circle represents a comet or "planet x"

please check this out lemme know what you think.
thanks in advance!!
content.summary: The crop circle that appeared near stone hedge / jupiter & venus conjunction

content.detailedDescription: On my balcony in preston overlooking torbay, devon, uk, looking east towards thatcher rock. great visibility about 7pm on a summer evening. the sun was behind the house and was still relatively high above the horizon. there was little cumulus and the wind was light. it was about 1 hour before high tide, fisherman were at the sea wall on the sea front. about 25-30' above the horizon looking east i witnessed a spinning orb for about 6-9 seconds. it just appeared from thin air, it looked like a spinning coin that flashed at a regular frequency. the spinning orb moved to my right towards berry head brixham about 1/2 mile from the end of the peninsula. the flashing appeared to intensify and the spinning orb disappeared. during the incident i checked myself and looked away towards torquay and returned my sight to the anomaly and it was still there. when the anomaly disappeared i held up my right hand to gauge the size of the craft. it was about half the size of my little finger nail, gauging the distance was difficult but appeared to be within 3-4nm of my location. the craft made no noise and moved laterally without elevation change. after the incident i went down and spoke to some fisherman about what had happened. one group said they saw it another group did not want to talk. i have lived all over the planet and have witnessed anomalies in sierra leone, africa, northern california (likely beale afb air traffic) and hot spots in the south west of england. i am not afraid of witnessing these occurrences. i worked in northern california for many years and have credible stories and professional witnesses that have seen and shared occurrences. i knew a fellow sailor who worked for the fbi in the et investigative branch based in sf. he shared stories that they were aware of 5 species of et. 3 friendly 2 hostile. this is going back 20 years now. they were capable of radar tracking craft as far as saturn. the information still scares me today. we are being observed and we need to make peace and settle our human petty differences and respect our planet, or else something worse will happen..
content.summary: Spinning chrome orb like a silver coin moved e to se hovered flashed and disappeared, multiple fisherman witnesess.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family were on vacation just sitting by a campfire having a good time laughing and just making memories ,but this was a memory that made us all think.So as i was sitting back looking at the wonderful but really mysterious sky ....I noticed this strange sphere object just sitting there in the sky as i noticed this object i was thinking in my head thats not normal i dramaticly pointed it out to my family they were all freaked out as i was too.At that time the one object became 3 objects moving very fast as it rised higher and higher in the sky the object at first looked like a burning rock falling from the sky but we soon realized it wasn't falling it was flying upwards similar to a plane without the blinking airplane lights 
it slowly started to fade away until the object was gone.I  had someone take a video of this and she still has it i know this objet was not normal this was a ufo sighting. i am 100% sure it was a ufo sighting because there is no plane, or jet that looks anything like it atleast with planes they make noise.
content.summary: orange flying object that faded away into a sky with no clouds

content.detailedDescription:
It was a hot summer afternoon. i was living with my mom in a house trailer, right off the main rout, and the first trailer in the park. the front door and the back door were almost across from one another and i had both main wood doors open and screen doors shut. there's a small deck off the back door and the front door. (trailer). i was alone, my mom had gone out for some errens. i was making coffee at the counter. this counter jutted out into the kitchen leaving the front door easily in my sight to the right and the back door just slightly pass my perifrial vision on the left. no tv, no music, no neighbors. out of the corner of my left eye, i saw movement at the back door. i looked and saw a 6' grasshopper ish being with a tuxedo with tails, a top hat, and a black cane with a carved bonelike top. he knocked on the back screen door. i looked back at my coffee cup in disbelief, then i looked again and it was still there, cocked his head. i looked away again in fear. looked one final time, saw it was still there and that's the last i remember. the whole event took only moments. 

i moved to l.A. in jan. of 1981. i had no memory of this event. i didn't tell my mom anything when she came home that day, i don't remember anything more from that day. 

it wasn't until i was in college that i remembered it. it came back as clear as it was that day not over time but all at once. i began telling the story to my close friends but there was always part of me that questioned weather it happened or not. i am an artist, maybe i made it up. but the detail was too clear and then i rented the vidio "communion". i'm sure you know the premis of that movie as well as it's location. when i saw the alien wearing the tux, tophat and cane, i damn near fell off my chair. it was like being hit with a brick. what are the odds of that. there's no way we both dreamed up the same being with those odd details. this is not your standard grey. i think it's important to note that the movie came out after my encounter. this was proof to me that i really saw it that day. i even made a painting of it that's a virtual photograph of the event. i would be glad to provide you with a copy of that painting. my purpose in writing you is to add my story to your records but more importantly i would really like to know if anyone eles has seen this and if they remember anything more about the encounter. i would really like to know what happened that afternoon after my 3rd and final glance. my rebooted memory stops at the third glance. but i got a feeling that was not the end of the story. please let me know if you have heard of anything like this and thank you for all you do to inform and facilitate. sincerely, donna
content.summary: I saw a 6' grasshopperish with a tuxedo with tails, tophat, and cane at my back door. before movie communion

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in the car with my girlfriend (had three ufo sightings over seven years with this same person).  the sun roof was open and we were looking at the sky.  i noticed a crescent shaped object darting at unbelievable speeds and constantly changing directions at high speeds.  it was far above the clouds, and an airplane flew beneath its flight path, so i could tell that it was very high up, and very large.

we both watched the object dart around the sky for about an hour, maybe less, then we drove on.
content.summary: White crescent shaped object darting around very, very high in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were in the alley next to the ogden theater with about a dozen other people waiting to go backstage and meet the band on new years night when i noticed a silver t shaped object surrounded by nine or more star-like orbs, float in from the south, float over the theater, hover, and then change direction.

it may be worth noting that all three of the ufos i witnessed in colorado, over the course of about sever years, were with this same girlfriend.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An object shaped like the letter t with multiple orbs around it witnessed by over a dozen people

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning to the military intelligence special agent school from the barracks. predator drones were being tested on the base, this was back in 1999-2000.  i watched the drones along their flight path as i walked through an empty field and saw a whitish-clear orb perfectly motionless far away.  it was there for the entire time that i was in the field.

i had the impression that it was observing the test flights.
content.summary: Contact lens like shape on the flight path of predator drone tests over military intelligence school

content.detailedDescription:
I was with a girlfriend at the dock yard of the cherry creek reservior.

the object was a black triangle. i noticed it flying low in the sky. it was broad daylight. no clouds. it flew in from the west, banked and turned at sharp angles rapidly. it flew directly above me and made no sound at all.  then it flew back into the west and landed at a fast 45 degree angle behind some trees.  the landing site was several miles away, so the object had to be very large. when it landed, it wasn't flat, but the points of the triangle were up and down.

i was really amazed at the object and didn't now what to make of it.  it had no discernible tail, cockpit, or any bulges or lumps.  it was very close, but there were no windows, lights, or appendages.
content.summary: Came from west aurora flew over reservoir, landed behind trees

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home from my friends house that is 2 houses down and i looked up at the sky to see very bright lights hovering in the sky i thought it was a plane but it was too bright to be a plane and i ran back to my friends house to tell them and my friends mum noticed it the night before but it had turned upside down this night. i went and got my mum and she could see white in between the two lights. it just sat there but after an hour we went back out side and it had moved a bit to the left. we thought it could possibly be a ufo but we didn't know for sure and the next day on the news in the morning talking about ufos and sightings. it goes during the day and returns during the night.
content.summary: There were 2 bright lights next to eachother one bigger than the other. neighbor said was there night before and next day ufo sightings on news

content.detailedDescription:
Wojsko zbagatelizowao moje nagranie po umieszczeniu go w gazecie na stronie www. zdarzenie widziay jeszcze trzy osoby i to byo jako jedyne nagrane . w sumie byy trzy zdarzenia z czego jedno wida na filmie a ostatnie nie uwiecznione byo spektakularne gdy obiekty si rozbiy . 

obiekty byy oddalone o jakie 120 km od miejsca obserwacji wic musiay by dosy wysoko .

moje wsprzdne 5414'56.879"n, 1557'22.087"e

wsprzdne obiektu 5450'24.537"n, 1623'11.973"e

obliczone wzgldem prdkoci poruszania si obiektu i czasu usyszanego grzmotu po znikniciu obiektu

nagranie mam stale w telefonie nie modyfikowane ze zgodn dat i godzin
content.summary: Co co widziaem wraz z czterema wiadkami

content.detailedDescription:
At home. my house is near the top of one of the highest hills for miles, with views over a wide area. 

just before 11pm i took the dogs out for their last wee and noticed extremely bright lightning. no thunder (that i could hear) very warm night after one of the hottest days here for a long time. the electrical storm made the news.

i took the dogs back inside and returned to the garden to watch the lightning. i was trying to catch it on film and texting friends.

whilst filming i noticed a vivid, bright green ball of light near the ground sw of me. bear in mind i'm higher than the surrounding area so i was looking slightly down on it. i'd estimate it to be somewhere near the top of the hill, across the valley i look across to. 

i didn't see where it came from but as i watched it was slowly ascending. the light was unwavering, not pulsating or flashing. it was like a green traffic light. 

i turned to film it rise, but it's hard to make out as i was only using my iphone. you can see it's moving in the video.

i then took a few pictures, some zoomed in. again, they're not very good.

i called my girlfriend, who watched it with me for less than a minute. i carried on filming the lightning, still watching it out of the corner of my eye, when suddenly it vanished.

there were no clouds between us and you can see from the video it's between me and the storm.

throughout, there was no noise. there was no thunder and it was fairly quiet. it was not a helicopter.

hard to tell size as it was just a light. duration is difficult to say as i didn't check, but minutes rather than seconds. i'd estimate 5 minutes.

i posted a pic on instagram and someone down the road (who was also posting lightning pics) checked theirs and various objects show up in their pictures. i'm not sure if this is the same, but the direction and time is the same. 

i presume this is a natural phenomena as it occurred during a storm, but the storm was a few miles away. i'm aware of the other possibilities but i'm stumped. i just wish i'd had a better camera on me.
content.summary: Bright green orb ascended and hovered several mins during electrical storm. some kind of natural phenomena?

content.detailedDescription: Numerous clusters of 3 lights per cluster hovering around in sky
content.summary: Numerous clusters of 3 lights per cluster.

content.detailedDescription: My father worked as a lumber jack. we lived in the timber camp fox park, wyoming. i was awakened in the night by an astronaut (without the air pack) walking through a solid door into my room to stand at the foot of my bed. he never spoke to me but i was unafraid. i wanted him to lift his visor to see his face but was afraid if i spoke he would go away. he watched me for a few minutes/moments. i was too fascinated to look at my clock to break the connection with him. he stood watching me until he heard my mother begin to scream out with her frequent nightmares she had been plagued with all summer. he turned to walk back through the same unopened solid door. i laid back down in my bed to return to my sleep thinking i had just had the most unusual dream. my sister and i shared a room but i didn't ever look at her thinking she was asleep and she wouldn't be interested in my dream. yet, in 2009 our father was seriously ill and we were travelling back to missouri where he lived and had been hospitalized we were talking about the story i had been writing. i confessed that the idea of the story had come from this same incident. my sister nearly ran off the road from surprise. she stopped on the side of the road to confess she had seen my astronaut in our room that night. she had watched him stand at the foot of my bed, too. i have no explanation for how, why or who.
content.summary: Astronaut figure walked through solid door into my bedroom i shared with my sister. he stood at the foot of my bed. he never spoke, watching me until my mother screamed from a nightmare she was having. he turned around returning through solid door.

content.detailedDescription: There is an unknown entity that lives next door to me that has tortured(physically) me for years and no one will listen!  i have taped the noise and sounds this individual makes and some recordings have been erased.  she has broken into my home numerous times to still things that are not replaceable.  i have done everything the police have told me to do (even taken a psychological test)(passed it) and judges and all groups ignore me.  this individual has inhuman powers that defies all scientific and psychological things.  she can go through walls to scare me, she can levitate and stay mid air, she sends lighting with fire on the end to my head, ears and body which is soo painful to me.  she sees through walls and can find me anywhere within my house, and if anyone comes to my door or i go to there offices, she can make them not listen and contradict everything i tell them.  she can change channels on my tv and radio(through walls) and right now, listens to me and anyone else in my home!  there is so much more tot ell, but please contact me so i can tell you this is more than anything i have evermore.  i at first thought she was into black magic or voodoo, but she has done more things to me that defy logic and reason.  i really believe she is of another planet! someone please call me.  i am disabled and it's difficult to get around.  that is why she chose me!!!  there is no object, only her.
content.summary: There is an unknown entity living next door for years now that tortures me daily!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I always see this at night.  so, this is what happens.  i will tell about one time i saw them.  the most impressive.  first, i am sure this is some military thing.  it could just be planes.  but, the way they move.  it is like nothing i have ever seen.  it like, goes forward and stops.  almost looking as if it goes back a bit.  

one night, i looked and saw one going left and right.  then, i looked on the other side and there were two.  one on the left and two on the right.  then, i looked back at the one and there were now three.  so it was three and two.  i looked back at the two an there were four.  so, it becomes three and four.  then, i looked back at the three and there were five.  five and four.  just going back and fourth.  left to right.  then, they are gone.  

i went outside once.  i get never get them on my phone.  they make no sounds.

when my mom was a kid, her and my grandparents, aunts and uncle looked out and something almost landed right in their yard.  it was really bight.  that must have been in the 70s.  it was in maryland, around a campground.
content.summary: A white dot appears.  goes left and right.  one, it was one left, two rigt.  then each sides number grew.  just vanish.

content.detailedDescription: Had several sightings as a corporate-charter lear jet pilot.  this description refers to my last sighting while flying my company cessna 310 with a friend of mine who did not believe in ufo's. sighting was near temple, tx. over lake whitney. i was flying in and out of the clouds under a instrument training hood. i flew out of the clouds and happened to notice a reflection. i looked up and saw 2 very bright lights that looked like close landing lights on a boing 747 coming at me. i tried to swerve to the right and descend rapidly. the lights seemed to stop and fly along with me.  one light was a little above the other.  the 2 large bright lights then moved very slowly from nw of my aircraft to directly west of my side window. then suddenly a third large light appeared to the rear of the other two lights with a little more distance between it and the first two. my friend had been looking down at some flight charts when i calmly ask him to look out  to the left of the aircraft. he is normally not very excitable but he became terrified and started to call ft worth center to report the sighting. i stopped him because i didn't want to be diverted to carswell afb for interrogation which had happened to a friend of mine. i did call center and ask them if there was any other traffic in my vicinity and they replied negative. i was not excited because i had several sightings on clear nights at 45,000 ft. flying from new york to dallas addison airport where we were based.These sightings were much further away and eventually took off at extremely high rate of speed leaving a short streak of light behind them as if there was some friction involved. the 3 large bright lights disappeared suddenly. these sightings all appeared between 1969 and 1982.  the first sightings appeared close to the usa moon landing,also the high altitude ufo's took off at about a 45 degree angle upward not downward.
content.summary: Appeared while flying private aircraft at near same altitude.

content.detailedDescription: At 10:25pm on 06/30/2015, i was driving home from work, heading north on rt. 9. i turned west onto a side road and immediately saw two lights in the sky.  the first light was large and bright, the second light was smaller and appeared to be just off of the larger light, at it's 1 o'clock. the larger light also appeared to have a "searchlight"; not looking in any particular direction. the lights did not appear to be moving and as i kept driving west i could see i was "catching up" to it and they were becoming farther up above me. after about a minute of driving west, the lights appeared to move from a stationary position to moving west as well at a good deal of speed. i then reached another side road and turned north. the lights then appeared to change direction from moving west to moving northwest. the smaller light then appeared to dim for a few seconds, then brighten, then dim, etc. i lost sight of the two lights when i pulled into my driveway. the street lights blocked out the sky. it did not appear to be a helicopter or plane; however, there is a small airport within a few miles of the sighting. the lights looked strange to me so i captured a few seconds of video and thought i should report it.
content.summary: Two lights - one larger and one smaller

content.detailedDescription: Well i live in san augustine in the woods and there are no airports , other than a small crop airfield. i do a lot of star gazing because it is so dark out here that you can see  falling stars, space junk and the space station on some nights... on this night 6-30-15 i was just star gazing and in the distance i could see what look like a pace craft shining beautiful collars as they flashed, i see this all the time and have been told it is a stares but they are usually farther away and more on the horizon.    i saw a small very white (bright) shooting down from my 12:00 position and dot believe it was a shooting star it started low and i in a cluster of very low stars. i had seen something like it to my 8:00 position  but did not get a good look at it,  then from that 8:00 position a craft with 4 lights or very bright engines, this move very fast to the 12:00 position near some of the colorful stare like objects, then went south east and i could no longer see it.(now this craft with 4 bright things made no sound at all) i hear airplanes much farther away then this was. i also saw earlier some objects with flashing red lights coming from the 8:00 position and going to 12:00 disappearing under the tree line.  i thought they were helicopters but moved like super fast up and downs around some of the stars and once again made no nose, it was something i thought i should report, maybe someone else seen this.. hope to hear from you maybe figure this out. thanks for your time jim
content.summary: I cant explain what i seen and would like someone to see if anyone elce seen it maybe radar ?

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning about age five i developed a need,  which soon became a compulsive need, to visually check all four corners of my bedroom before i could turn off the light and go to sleep. this need was the same even when we moved to a new house. i don't know what i expected to see, or what i was afraid would be there, but i absolutely had to check the corners before i could relax and go to sleep. as a child i was never afraid of the common childhood scary things. i was not afraid of an under the bed monster or the closet monster, the corners of my bedroom drew my concern.

in the summer of 1966 i was eleven years old. i lived with my mother, a single working mom, in the city of nevada, mo, a town of about 10,000 people. we had a large older home situated on the corner of a typical four way intersection in a neighborhood of similar homes. it was just my mother and i in the four bedroom home.
  i am unsure of the exact date but at some point during the summer vacation from school, i began waking up each night from a sound sleep to the same mental image. i would not be dreaming about the image prior to waking. during those brief moments between sleep state and being awake, the moments when you know you have been asleep and you know you are waking up but are not fully awake, that collection of brief moments would always be the same. i would have a vividly clear image of hugging a smooth, white, warm, cylindrical object that was emitting a pulsating energy of some sort. the pulsating was on for 1  seconds and off for the same amount of time. i would hear but more so feel a humming during the pulsations. the energy emitting from the object had no noticeable effect on me. there was no electrical shock or tingly feeling. no real feeling at all yet i was certain it was emitting energy of some sort. i do not know why i felt it was emitting energy but it was certain to me that it was doing so. i would be sitting beside this object with my arms stretched out and wrapped against it. it was about four feet tall and probably five feet in diameter. every night i would awaken to this mental image. as soon as i was fully awake the image would go away and i was able to go back to sleep. at first it was puzzling and confusing as to why this was happening. after a few months of this it became frustrating. after eight or nine months of waking to this every night i became quite angry about it. after what was probably a year of waking to this mental image every night i awakened this night, as usual, but instead of rolling over and going back to sleep i sat up on the edge of my bed, feet on the floor, and rested my hands on my knees. i stared at the floor just in front of my feet and tried to figure out why this was happening and what this object was and where had i seen it. i had become quite angry with the situation. in my mind i screamed what is this and why do i keep seeing it?  the memory that unfolded to me that night was as clear and vivid as any memory i have. it was not a dream. it was not an eleven year old boys imagination. it was shockingly real and unfolded as follows:

i woke up in my bed, unsure of the time but it was dark. i raised my head just enough to see four creatures coming towards my bed. one came from each corner of my bedroom. they were about four feet tall and even though it was dark there was enough moonlight coming in my windows i could tell they did not look like regular people. the next thing i remember is being carried above their heads across our front lawn, over the curb and into the street. i could not feel their hands but also did not feel as though i was laying on anything. there was a very thick fog all around and a bright white light was reflecting off the fog and the intersection was extremely lit up. i could see just enough of the front of a house to recognize it as the house across the street from ours. i was being carried to the intersection on our corner. i looked to my left and saw my mother being carried in the same manner. her eyes were closed and she appeared to be asleep. i felt sedated but at the same time i knew this was actually happening. i felt no fear and no need to struggle to free myself. in the center of the intersection sat a craft. it was perhaps thirty feet in diameter and was saucer shaped. it was probably ten to twelve feet from top to bottom at the center angling to eight or ten inches at its rounded edges. it was standing on three legs that appeared to unfold from the bottom. there was a hatch that folded down to form a ramp. i remembered thinking it was odd that they parked in the middle of the intersection. what if a car came along and hit it? what if a neighbor looked out the window and saw it? i know its hard to believe but these were my only thoughts about the situation i had found myself and my mother in. i should have been terrified. i should have been trying to get free and run away or something. i can only attribute it to the sedation. 
 i do not remember being carried into the craft. i next woke up sitting on the floor in a circular room that appeared to be the same diameter as the craft i had seen in the intersection. the room was about seven feet high. i do not know if there were other levels above or below. it was white and well lit although it was not apparent where the light was coming from. the walls of the room angled to a small height just as the exterior of the craft had. the inside of the room seemed very plain and devoid of knobs and switches and gauges compared to the pictures i had seen of the gemini space capsules our astronauts flew in. across from me was a counter a few feet above the floor and above the counter was what appeared to be cabinets.
 i had the feeling i had just stopped crying. i looked up and a creature was kneeling down in front of me. she was about four feet tall with gray weathered looking skin. her hairless head was too large for her body. she had very little muscle mass. she had large black almond shaped eyes and practically no nose and a slit for a mouth maybe two inches wide. she fit, perfectly, the description of a gray alien but it would be close to twenty years before i heard the term or saw an artists rendition of one. she asked me are you alright now? even though she did not actually say the words, i heard them perfectly. i could hear the sound of her voice in my head and there was no noticeable accent. at age eleven i was not familiar with the term telepathic. i answered her with yes. she smiled a tiny smile and i found her to be very comforting. i should have been terrified but i was not. i should have been full of questions but i felt no need to be so. again, i can only attribute that to being sedated. 

 i heard my mother making a sound she made whenever she was very scared. i looked to my left across the room and i saw her lying on a table with four or five creatures surrounding the table. i could not see what they were doing to her. they all looked like the creature kneeling in front of me. i said they are hurting my mom. she said no, theyre not. she thinks they are but she will be fine. i said well, she doesnt like that. the creature in front of me smiled that tiny smile again and said no, she doesnt like it but she will be fine. she again asked me was i alright now and i responded yes, i am. with that she stood up and walked four or five steps across the room and sat on a type of chair or stool and began doing something with a small device on the counter in front of her. i have no idea what the device was or what she was doing with it. in 1966 a basic computer filled a large room and i had no concept of todays pc or laptop. i felt the need to go back to sleep so i leaned against an object to my immediate left. it was a cylindrical object about four feet tall and five feet in diameter. it was white and warm. i stretched my arms out and placed them against it as well as the side of my face. it was pulsating and emitted a hum and i could feel a type of energy emitting from it. i went to sleep. i have no memory of being examined or how i got back into my home.

after this memory unfolded before me that night i felt relief that i finally knew what i had been waking up to every night. i accepted the fact that this had actually happened to me and my mother. i cannot understand why i did not find the experience frightening or why i felt no need to ask any questions about who these creatures were and what did they want from us. i can only attribute it to being sedated. in no way do i feel this experience negatively impacted my life. if anything, i feel the opposite. i say that because i do not have to wonder if reports of ufos are real or not. i do not have to try and keep an open mind about reports of abductions. i know they are real and i have honestly been aboard at least one craft. 

 i do often wonder why i started feeling the need to check the corners of my bedroom many years before the abduction occurred. i cannot see it as a precognitive situation. had i been abducted earlier and simply have no memory of the event? why can i remember the one abduction and not any other(s)? i do not wake up nightly to the humming and feeling of pulsating energy from the object anymore, that stopped the night the memory came to me, but i do still need to check the corners of whatever room i am sleeping in. 

i only discussed this event with my mother one time a few years before her death. (i did not discuss it with her as a child because i was afraid if she had no memory of it she would not react well to hearing her son say he had been in a flying saucer.) i asked her if she had any memory of being carried out of our house one night in nevada, mo. she got a panicked look on her face and said she had made peace with it by convincing herself it was just a bad dream and wanted to leave it that way. i respected her wishes and made no further mention of it. 

i am submitting this because i feel the work mufon does is important and the only way we will ever get to the truth is if people make their experiences known. i give mufon permission to use the description of this event in whatever manner they see fit. i give mufon permission to contact me if they wish to do so. i do not want my name or contact info to be made public.
content.summary: Abducted at age 11 along with my mother in 1966

content.detailedDescription: I was on american airlines flight 166 from boston to lax when i observed a group of objects flying effortlessly through the clouds over the desert of what i think was nevada. my phone was still on eastern time at the time and reports the time of the photos i took as 3:05 pm so i am sure the flight data would help locate the place where this occurred. i was on the right side of the plane, facing north out of the window when i noticed at least six bright, shining, almost burning orbs in the clouds. some dipped down behind the clouds. others rose. they illuminated and cast shadows in the clouds as they moved. i was dumbfounded at first and it took me a few minutes to even thing to get my phone out and record the events. by the time i got my phone out, only three remained. and by the time i thought to switch from still photos to videos only one remained. three appeared in a formation. others ascended and descended independently. i shot the photos, recorded video, and then the last one faded.
content.summary: Fleet of orbs irratically moving, appearing, disappearing observed from airplane window

content.detailedDescription:
I got off work at about 6 am and it normally takes about 35 minutes to get home. about 10 minutes from home on a dark country road. it was still dark outside, when i  there was something off to my right in the east out of the corner of my eye. when i suddenly found myself about 1 mile down the road from where i was, and the sun coming up which didn't occur until 7:15 ish. the sun wasn't up yet but when i got home the sun was fully over the horizon.

i felt like something happened, but i could not and still cannot remember what happened. i was initially frightened, from being farther down the road than i was before and the sky going from black to daylight. but i also felt like what ever happened wasn't dangerous and was benevolent.
content.summary: Missing time:
